body.p: This sample is to demonstrate the potential simplicity of an XSLT script to be used within XSLT-Conref.
The task is to generate an itemized list of cross references for all sections with a title and id attribute.

Within the schema there is a specialized element section-overview being defined with the URN of the XSLT script set as default value. Thus, the author has to do nothing beside inserting the element in the body.
